    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents
    Contains the core components of the WComponent framework.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.thumbnail
    Contains classes for providing thumbnail images.

      Provides a bridge to static image resources which are present in the class path, but not in the web application itself.

      Classes in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.thumbnail that implement Image 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BytesImage
      An Image specified by a byte array.
      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.thumbnail that return Image 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Image ThumbnailUtil.createThumbnail(InputStream is, String name, Dimension scaledSize, String mimeType)
      This method takes a input document (represented by an InputStream) and returns a byte[] representing a JPEG "thumb nail" of a given page of the document.
